solution_line_template: Due to carpal tunnel syndrome, Barbara can only type {initial_typing_speed} - {speed_reduction}= <<{initial_typing_speed}-{speed_reduction}={new_typing_speed}>>{new_typing_speed} words per minute.
So, she will be able to finish typing the document in {total_words}/{new_typing_speed} = <<{total_words}/{new_typing_speed}={time_to_finish}>>{time_to_finish} minutes.
